import React from 'react'; import Box from '@mui/material/Box'; import Typography from '@mui/material/Typography'; import Button from '@mui/material/Button'; import Grid from '@mui/material/Grid'; import Accordion from '@mui/material/Accordion'; import AccordionSummary from '@mui/material/AccordionSummary'; import AccordionDetails from '@mui/material/AccordionDetails'; import ExpandMoreIcon from '@mui/icons-material/ExpandMore'; const VirtualMechatronicsLab = () => { return (
{/* Home Section */} Virtual Mechatronics Lab Our lab leverages the latest technologies to create highly detailed and interactive simulations of mechatronic systems. This innovative approach significantly enhances the design, development, and deployment processes, resulting in more efficient, effective, and groundbreaking solutions in the field of mechatronics. Integration of Virtual Reality and Digital Technologies {/* More About Section */} {/* Virtual Reality Section */} Virtual Reality immerses you in computer-generated environments, seamlessly blending the physical and digital worlds. Why Study Virtual Reality in Dekut? Accessibility for students Enhance STEM Education Enhanced Training Personalized Learning {/* Feature Section */} Experience Mechatronics Excellence We lead in virtual mechatronics solutions, blending VR, robotics, and automation with unparalleled expertise. {/* Projects Section */} Explore Our Recent Projects {/* Testimonial Section */} What Our Sponsors & Partners Say! The virtual mechatronics lab has had the great pleasure of engaging with sponsors and partners. Here are the words they have to say. "Partnering with a Virtual Mechatronics Lab can be a powerful way to achieve various business goals." Prof. Eng. Jean Bosco University Professor
); }; const AccordionComponent = ({ items }) => ( {items.map((item, index) => ( }> {item.title} {item.content} ))} ); const FeatureList = () => ( <> {[ 'Unmatched expertise in virtual mechatronics education', 'Immersive learning experiences through innovative integration', 'Streamlined processes for enhanced educational efficiency', ].map((feature, index) => ( {feature} ))} ); const ProjectItem = ({ imgSrc, title, description }) => ( {title} {description} ); export default VirtualMechatronicsLab;
